About

Hello internet stranger!

Hi, I am SB! Born and brought up in Jamshedpur, Jharkhand. I am an Electrical Engineering graduate from Thapar Insitute of Engineering and Technology, Patiala and currently working in Oracle India.

This is my personal blog. I prefer to call my posts random ramblings. Have a particular inclination towards railways, history, trivia, books and sometimes photography, the last still being in the nascent stage. Railways has always been a favourable means of transport - a childhood fixation carried on pleasurably till now. Hence, the name of this blog. Side Lower.

All images in this blog are taken by me unless specified otherwise. The cover image is taken by Faris Mohammed. This site is powered by Jekyll using Long Haul by Brian Maier Jr.

I can be reached at soham[dot]live[at]gmail[dot]com

© 2020 Soham Banerjee.
